imdb.title: Hanyô no Yashahime
imdb.plot: An adventure following Sesshomaru's half-demon twin daughters, Towa and Setsuna, as they discover the mysteries of their past along with Moroha, the daughter of Inuyasha and Kagome.

episodes.title: Tenseiga o motsu to iu koto
episodes.plot: After the battle against Kirinmaru, Sesshomaru appears before Towa and asks her to wield the broken Tenseiga to revive Setsuna.

episodes.title: Umi no yôrei
episodes.plot: As instructed by Totosai, the girls begin to search for Bokuseno to find out where to acquire a Kyuyokon root for Towa. During their search, they come across a village where women with long hair are attacked by a sea snake demon.

episodes.title: Ginrin no noroi
episodes.plot: Towa, Setsuna, and Moroha continue their search for Bokuseno. Meanwhile, while Sesshomaru and Jaken watch over the sleeping Rin, Jaken recalls the day fourteen years ago when Zero placed a curse on Rin.

episodes.title: Musubi yama no kekkai
episodes.plot: The girls arrive at Mount Musubi to retrieve the Kyuyokon root. The mountain is surrounded by a barrier, which Moroha is able to pass through easily due to her spiritual powers. When she enters, she finds a girl sleeping on the mountain.

episodes.title: Rion to iu na no shôjo
episodes.plot: The girl on Mount Musubi introduces herself as Rion, the daughter of Kirinmaru, who had been sealed on the mountain for 600 years. She asks Towa and the others to defeat her father in order to set her free and put a stop to his plans.

episodes.title: Taijiya Hisui
episodes.plot: Setsuna is kidnapped by Princess Aiya's servants and is brought to her mansion. Wanting to avoid her studies, Princess Aiya asks Setsuna to switch places with her for one day. When her tutor arrives, however, it turns out to be Hisui.

episodes.title: Takechiyo no irai
episodes.plot: Takechiyo requests Moroha to be his bodyguard when he needs to return to his home to deal with an ongoing family feud. Meanwhile, Kohaku tries teaching Towa a lesson in running away from battle when he notices her reckless fighting habits.

episodes.title: Nanahoshi no shôginga
episodes.plot: Setsuna travels with Kohaku, Hisui, and the other demon slayers to a northern village to assist the demons slayers of the north. Meanwhile, Kirinmaru appears before Towa, who is accompanied by Riku and Rion.

episodes.title: Mayonaka no hômonsha
episodes.plot: The demon-god Mayonaka continues to attack Gokoku Village with Flame Bulls to acquire the village's sacred object. While the demon slayers defend the village, Setsuna meets Mayonaka and learns of his reason for attacking Gokoku Village.

episodes.title: Kessen no saku (zenpen)
episodes.plot: On the new moon, Zero sets her plan into motion, targeting Towa while she's powerless. Setsuna also loses her powers while being hunted by a snow demon. Moroha learns from Hachi about Inuyasha and Kagome's battle against Shogen Mamiana.

episodes.title: Kessen no saku (kôhen)
episodes.plot: While in her human form, Towa is abducted by Zero and Nanahoshi. Moroha, Takechiyo, and Hachi continue their fight against Shogen. Kohaku and the other demon slayers fight off the snow demon that is searching for Setsuna.

episodes.title: Towa ni nai basho
episodes.plot: Zero uses Nanahoshi's insects to extract Towa's sadness from her, causing Towa to revisit her memories of loneliness as she grew up in the modern age. Meanwhile, Sesshomaru finds Setsuna and orders her to go to the Tree of Ages to see Rin.

episodes.title: Zero no omoi
episodes.plot: An enraged Towa attacks Zero with the intention of killing her. Setsuna arrives to stop Towa because of Rin's curse, which cannot be lifted until Zero moves on from her past regrets. Meanwhile, Sesshomaru gives Moroha the Black Pearl.

episodes.title: Shinonome no Kirinmaru
episodes.plot: Kirinmaru takes the Black Pearl from Moroha and demands that she find Akuru. Sesshomaru, Towa, and Setsuna arrive at the scene and Sesshomaru begins to duel with Kirinmaru. The girls join in the fight, but this rouses Kirinmaru's anger.

episodes.title: Oyako no saikai
episodes.plot: Towa, Setsuna, and Moroha are sucked into the Black Pearl and are sent to the border of the afterlife, where Moroha is reunited with Inuyasha and Kagome. Meanwhile, Rin and Jaken search for Towa, whose sword is needed save Sesshomaru.

episodes.title: Sanhime no dasshutsu
episodes.plot: Inuyasha comes up with a plan to escape the border of the afterlife. At the grave of the Great Dog Demon, Inuyasha instructs Towa to summon Tenseiga, which will be the key to their escape.

episodes.title: Akuru no kazaguruma
episodes.plot: After removing Kirinmaru's demonic energy from Sesshomaru, Towa collapses and is in critical condition. Kirinmaru appears before Inuyasha, Kagome, and Moroha. In the Reiwa era, Osamu Kirin sees the Grim Comet approach closer to the earth.

episodes.title: Hôkai suru toki no kazaguruma
episodes.plot: To stop the Grim Comet in the modern era, Towa, Setsuna, and Moroha must travel through time using the Windmill of Time. But to use it, they first must defeat a demon called Meidomaru.

episodes.title: Anten no Sutêji
episodes.plot: Towa, Setsuna, and Moroha return to the modern age. Osamu Kirin asks for their help to defend the city from the demons that have appeared due to the Grim Comet.

episodes.title: Yôreisei ga ochiru toki
episodes.plot: Towa, Setsuna, Moroha, and Osamu Kirin work together to stop the Grim Comet from hitting the earth. Meanwhile, back in the feudal era, Inuyasha and the others fight off the swarms of demons that emerged from the Windmill of Time.

episodes.title: Kirin Osamu no ayakashi seibatsu
episodes.plot: Osamu Kirin brings the Grim Comet into the feudal era. He finds Rion and convinces her to work with him to create a world they both desire. Towa, Setsuna, and Moroha are stuck in the present and must find a way back to the feudal era.

episodes.title: Zetsubô no yôrei chô
episodes.plot: Under the control of Rion and Osamu Kirin, the Grim Butterfly sets out to destroy all of the demons in the world. Towa and the others approach and enter the butterfly to rescue Rion. Meanwhile, Sesshomaru and Kirinmaru begin to battle.

episodes.title: Chichi to musume to
episodes.plot: Towa is able to defeat Osamu Kirin, but not without a cost. She rejoins Setsuna and Moroha and assists with cutting Rion's Threads of Fate. Whenever a thread is cut, Rion's true feelings for her father are revealed.

episodes.title: Towa ni tsuzuku mirai
episodes.plot: The world has been saved from the Degenerate Age. Inuyasha helps Moroha pay off her debt while Towa and Setsuna spend time with Rin. Later, a stranger approaches Jyubei requesting strong demon slayers to slay a demon.

episodes.title: Are kara no Inuyasha
episodes.plot: Captured by a deputy shogun and his vassal in feudal Japan, Towa Higurashi is told the story of an event that took place over a decade ago, when Inuyasha, Kagome, and their friends were attacked by a demon called Root Head.

episodes.title: Sanbiki no hime
episodes.plot: 10 years ago, in the feudal era, Towa and Setsuna were sisters living in a forest until a fire broke out. During the fire, the two became separated and Towa was drawn into a time portal that sent her into the future to modern day Japan.

episodes.title: Yume no kochô
episodes.plot: Setsuna and Moroha arrive with a demon in the modern era through the Sacred Tree at Higurashi Shrine. Towa is reunited with Setsuna, but Setsuna has no memories of her and refuses to believe that Towa is her twin sister.

episodes.title: Kako e no tobira
episodes.plot: Moroha negotiates with Root Head to open the pathway to the feudal era. Towa decides to return to the feudal era with Setsuna and Moroha. When the portal opens and they travel back in time, they encounter the Spirit of the Tree of Ages.

episodes.title: Akahone goten no Jakotsumaru
episodes.plot: Back in the feudal era, Towa and Setsuna take on a job to slay a demon Jakotsumaru, a demon boy who is stealing the bones of humans and animals. They meet up with Moroha, who arrives to claim a bounty for Jakotsumaru's father, Tokotsu.

episodes.title: Furudera no neko Juan
episodes.plot: Travelers are going missing one after another. Towa, Setsuna, and Moroha head to the northern mountains to crack the case, but instead they find a village completely overrun by ghost cats.

episodes.title: Ringo no deai
episodes.plot: Towa goes to search for the Dream Butterfly. When she gets lost, she encounters a pirate named Riku, who is trying to find his ship. When Towa helps him out, Riku presents her with the real Kikujumonji sword.

episodes.title: Yume hiraki no wana
episodes.plot: Towa, Setsuna, and Moroha chase after Yotsume, who flees to Kyuki's lair. With the help of a Rainbow Pearl from Kyuki, Yotsume casts a spell on the girls to put them to sleep and discover their weaknesses through their dreams.

episodes.title: Meiôjû no Meifuku
episodes.plot: The girls take on a case to slay a demon, who happens to be Konton, one of the Four Perils. Konton wields a strong armor, making him a difficult enemy, but the girls receive help from a young demon whose father was killed by Konton.

episodes.title: Kin to gin no nijiiro shinju
episodes.plot: The girls set out to slay the demon twins, Kinka and Ginka, who are wreaking havoc as they duel each other. When the twins discover that Towa and Setsuna have the Silver and Gold Rainbow Pearls, they posses their bodies to obtain them.

episodes.title: Hito kui-numa no noroi
episodes.plot: Towa and Setsuna learn about a pond that devours any human or animal that comes near it. When they go investigate it, they come across two siblings who lost their parents to the pond.

episodes.title: Saku no yoru, kurokami no Towa
episodes.plot: Konton sends the demon Nikosen, a former human sage, to kill Towa, Setsuna, and Moroha. Being lured to him by his poison, the girls battle Nikosen. But as the nighttime approaches, Towa suddenly finds her demonic powers are fading away.

episodes.title: Sengoku oishî hôshi
episodes.plot: The demon Totetsu, one of the Four Perils, is hunting down and devouring monks found throughout the land. Kohaku sends Hisui, Towa, and Setsuna, to find Hisui's father, Miroku, to guard and protect him from the man-eating demon.

episodes.title: Mori o yaita kuromaku
episodes.plot: Towa, Setsuna and Moroha go to slay a mountain god, Homura, who had abducted a beautiful girl. When the girls find him, Homura is shocked by Towa and Setsuna's presence, believing to have killed the twins in the forest fire years ago.

episodes.title: Gesshoku, unmei no sekibetsu
episodes.plot: Riku recalls events that took place beginning 18 years ago, when Inuyasha receives a new Black Pearl. 4 years later, on the night of Towa and Setsuna's birth, Inuyasha and Sesshomaru learn of a cataclysmic event that needs to be stopped.

episodes.title: Moroha no yaiba
episodes.plot: Konton barters with Yawaragi, Moroha's former master, to take Moroha's life in exchange for an item she seeks. Yawaragi appears before Moroha, and a showdown between master and pupil begins.

episodes.title: Ni kyô no wana
episodes.plot: Riku informs Towa, Setsuna, and Moroha about the whereabouts of Totetsu and they set out to slay him. In their pursuit, Totetsu leads them to a ravine where, unbeknownst to the girls, Konton has set up a trap to ensnare and destroy them.

episodes.title: Sesshômaru to Kirinmaru
episodes.plot: Towa and Setsuna break free from Konton's trap and defeat him. They meet up with Moroha to finish off Totetsu, but he flees the battle. The girls chase after him but are suddenly attacked and find themselves face to face with Kirinmaru.

episodes.title: Aiya-hime no Beniyasha taiji
episodes.plot: The demon slayers are offered a chance to be employed by the deputy shogun, but they must battle against a group of bounty hunters, which includes Moroha. Not wanting Towa to get involved, the two parties try to keep the battle a secret.

episodes.title: Hanyô no kakurezato
episodes.plot: While on the lookout for demons deep in the mountains, Setsuna reveals to Towa what occurred during the 10 years they were separated.

episodes.title: Nijiiro shinju no himitsu
episodes.plot: On the night of the new moon, Towa is visited by Riku and he reveals his intentions of gathering all seven of the Rainbows Pearls. During their conversation, Totetsu suddenly appears to attack the currently powerless Towa.

episodes.title: Ubawareta fûin
episodes.plot: Zero appears before the girls and removes the seal suppressing Setsuna's demon powers. When Setsuna transforms and loses control, Towa and Moroha struggle to stop her rampage.

episodes.title: Sanhime no gyakushû
episodes.plot: Towa and Setsuna hire Moroha to assist them with slaying Zero. They go to the location where the Great Dog Demon had perished long ago and find Zero, but Riku is there to defend her.

episodes.title: Sesshômaru no musume de aru to iu koto
episodes.plot: Kirinmaru arrives and intervenes in the battle by scattering the Rainbow Pearls. Zero, enraged with her brother, cuts ties with him and flees. Sesshomaru chases after her, leaving Towa, Setsuna, and Moroha to face off against Kirinmaru.
